name: .CC3.SB3
summary: Learn about .CC3.SB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CC3.SB3 file with Clipteam ClipCC or MIT Scratch. To do so, open either program and select File â†’ Load from your computer. Then, navigate to and open your CC3.SB3 file.

If you want to extract and view the assets a CC3.SB3 file contains, you can change the file's extension to .ZIP and open it with any Zip-decompression utility, such as Windows' built-in Zip-decompression utility or Apple Archive Utility.
